short_summary: Roof replacement project for buildings 1 and 7
description: This is a mandatory procurement request for a roof replacement project for buildings 1 and 7 located at the Archambault Minimum Institution.  The procurement is seeking a general contractor to replace the roof shingles, and the project is expected to be completed within 20 weeks.  The tender closing date is March 15, 2024, and the expected contract start date is March 25, 2024.  The procurement is open to suppliers from all regions.
full_summary:
---
**Tender Announcement Reference: CB-948-63623736**
=============================================

**Roof Replacement for Buildings 1 and 7 at the Archambault Minimum Institution**
-----------------------------------------------

**Contracting Authority:** Correctional Service Canada

**Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, March 15, 2024, at 14:00

**Estimated Value:** As per the Solicitation Document

**Purpose:** The Correctional Service Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the roof replacement of Buildings 1 and 7 at the Archambault Minimum Institution in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec.

**Scope of Work:** The project includes the supply, labor, equipment, and materials necessary to replace the roof shingles on both buildings. The work must be completed within a period of twenty (20) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Location:** Buildings 1 and 7, Archambault Minimum Institution, Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec

**Duration:** The contract is expected to commence on March 25, 2024, and end on July 19, 2024.

**Eligibility:** All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The trade agreement for this project is the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** The successful bidder will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Mandatory Site Visit:** A mandatory site visit will be held as per the Solicitation Document.

**Technical Requirements and Specifications:** Please refer to the Solicitation Document and attached documents for details.

**Contact Information:**

* Karine Clément, Contracting and Procurement Regional Officer
	+ Telephone: (514) 235-8177
	+ Email: [karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca)

**Documents:**

* Solicitation Document
* Bid Solicitation Document
* Specification
* Drawings

**Submission Instructions:**

Bidders are required to submit their bids in the digital format as specified in the Solicitation Document. Bids must be submitted before the closing date and time.

**Language of the Contract:** The contract will be written in English or French, as per the Federal Government's language policy.

**Debriefing:**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within fifteen (15) working days of receipt of the results.
